publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-627.3 Shona Robison: Progress in Respect of Fuel Poverty in Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S2M-627) in the name of Ms Margaret Curran, leave out from "endorses" to end and insert "recognises that in energy rich Scotland one in six households are still suffering fuel poverty, and believes that in order to help meet the Scottish Executive's commitment to eradicate fuel poverty by 2016, the central heating programme should be extended to families with young children, people with disabilities and pensioners with inadequate heating." Supported by: Mrs Margaret Ewing*
